Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

On Friday, June 21, we'll be at McMenamin's Old St. Francis School for our fun and informative Pints & Rights event. We'd love to see you there!

Pints & Rights in Bend

Join ACLU supporters for a fun evening in Downtown Bend!

Friday, June 21, 6 p.m.
McMenamin's Old St. Francis School
700 NW Bond St.
Bend, OR, 97701

RSVP TODAY

Grab a beer, get something to eat, connect with ACLU staff and supporters from throughout Central Oregon, and learn more about the pressing civil rights and civil liberties facing Oregonians. At this event during Pride season, we'll be highlighting the fight for LGBTQ+ rights throughout the state.

RSVP to Pints & Rights in Bend.

We'll see you soon!

ACLU of Oregon
